update RL_RETURN_VISIT set RETURNVISIT_ID = #record.returnvisitId:DECIMAL#, BORROWER_ID = #record.borrowerId:DECIMAL#, CONTACT_TIME = #record.contactTime:DATE#, CONTACT_WAY = #record.contactWay:VARCHAR#, CLIENTELE_ATTITUDE = #record.clienteleAttitude:VARCHAR#, CUSTOM_MANAGER = #record.customManager:VARCHAR#, SURVEY_RECODE = #record.surveyRecode:VARCHAR#, BORROWER_NAME = #record.borrowerName:VARCHAR#, GROUP_NUMBER = #record.groupNumber:VARCHAR#, CONTACT_CHANGE = #record.contactChange:VARCHAR#, ADDRESS_CHANGE = #record.addressChange:VARCHAR#, WORKING_CHANGE = #record.workingChange:VARCHAR#, MONTH_INCOME = #record.monthIncome:VARCHAR#, VASTEXPENSE_REASON = #record.vastexpenseReason:VARCHAR#, PAYPRESSURE_REASON = #record.paypressureReason:VARCHAR#, FAMILYMEMBERS_CHANGE = #record.familymembersChange:VARCHAR#, OTHER_FAMILYSTATUS_REASON = #record.otherFamilystatusReason:VARCHAR#, OTHER_WORKING_CHANGE = #record.otherWorkingChange:VARCHAR#, OTHER_VASTEXPENSE_REASON = #record.otherVastexpenseReason:VARCHAR#, OTHER_PAYPRESSURE_REASON = #record.otherPaypressureReason:VARCHAR#, KEYTO_FOLLOWUP = #record.keytoFollowup:VARCHAR#, CONTACT_CHANGE_DETAIL = #record.contactChangeDetail:VARCHAR#, ADDRESS_CHANGE_DETAIL = #record.addressChangeDetail:VARCHAR#, WORKING_CHANGE_DETAIL = #record.workingChangeDetail:VARCHAR#, MONTH_INCOME_DETAIL = #record.monthIncomeDetail:VARCHAR#, VASTEXPENSE_REASON_DETAIL = #record.vastexpenseReasonDetail:VARCHAR#, PAYPRESSURE_REASON_DETAIL = #record.paypressureReasonDetail:VARCHAR#, FAMILYMEMBERS_CHANGE_DETAIL = #record.familymembersChangeDetail:VARCHAR#, OTHER_FAMILYSTATUS_DETAIL = #record.otherFamilystatusDetail:VARCHAR#, OTHER_WORKING_DETAIL = #record.otherWorkingDetail:VARCHAR#, OTHER_VASTEXPENSE_DETAIL = #record.otherVastexpenseDetail:VARCHAR#, OTHER_PAYPRESSURE_DETAIL = #record.otherPaypressureDetail:VARCHAR#, KEYTO_FOLLOWUP_DETAIL = #record.keytoFollowupDetail:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select r.returnvisit_id as returnvisitId, r.borrower_id as borrowerId, r.contact_time as contactTime, r.contact_way as contactWay, r.clientele_attitude as clienteleAttitude, r.custom_manager as customManager, r.survey_recode as surveyRecode, r.borrower_name as borrowerName, r.group_number as groupNumber, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.contact_change)||DECODE(nvl(r.contact_change_detail,'1'),'1',' ',' ')||r.contact_change_detail as contactChangeDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.address_change)||' '||r.address_change_detail as addressChangeDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.working_change)||' '||r.working_change_detail as workingChangeDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.month_income) ||' '||r.month_income_detail as monthIncomeDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.vastexpense_reason)||' '||r.vastexpense_reason_detail as vastexpenseReasonDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.paypressure_reason)||' '||r.paypressure_reason_detail as paypressureReasonDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.familymembers_change)||' '||r.familymembers_change_detail as familymembersChangeDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.other_familystatus_reason)||' '||r.other_familystatus_detail as otherFamilystatusDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.other_working_change)||' '||r.other_working_detail as otherWorkingDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.other_vastexpense_reason)||' '||r.other_vastexpense_detail as otherVastexpenseDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.other_paypressure_reason)||' '||r.other_paypressure_detail as otherPaypressureDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.keyto_followup)||' '||r.keyto_followup_detail as keytoFollowupDetails from rl_return_visit r
r.contact_time = #contactTime:DATE#
r.contact_way = #contactWay#
r.group_number = #groupNumber#
r.custom_manager = #customManager#
#beginContactTime:DATE# >= r.contact_time
r.contact_time >= #endContactTime:DATE#

select count(*) from rl_return_visit r
r.contact_time = #contactTime:DATE#
r.contact_way = #contactWay#
r.group_number = #groupNumber#
r.custom_manager = #customManager#
#beginContactTime:DATE# >= r.contact_time
r.contact_time >= #endContactTime:DATE#

select r.returnvisit_id as returnvisitId, r.borrower_id as borrowerId, r.contact_time as contactTime, r.contact_way as contactWay, r.clientele_attitude as clienteleAttitude, r.custom_manager as customManager, r.survey_recode as surveyRecode, r.borrower_name as borrowerName, r.group_number as groupNumber, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.contact_change)||' '||r.contact_change_detail as contactChangeDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.address_change)||' '||r.address_change_detail as addressChangeDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.working_change)||' '||r.working_change_detail as workingChangeDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.month_income) ||' '||r.month_income_detail as monthIncomeDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.vastexpense_reason)||' '||r.vastexpense_reason_detail as vastexpenseReasonDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.paypressure_reason)||' '||r.paypressure_reason_detail as paypressureReasonDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.familymembers_change)||' '||r.familymembers_change_detail as familymembersChangeDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.other_familystatus_reason)||' '||r.other_familystatus_detail as otherFamilystatusDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.other_working_change)||' '||r.other_working_detail as otherWorkingDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.other_vastexpense_reason)||' '||r.other_vastexpense_detail as otherVastexpenseDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.other_paypressure_reason)||' '||r.other_paypressure_detail as otherPaypressureDetails, (select c.code_value from rl_codetable c where c.section ='yesOrNo' and c.code_key = r.keyto_followup)||' '||r.keyto_followup_detail as keytoFollowupDetails from rl_return_visit r where r.borrower_id like '%$fuzzyValue$%', or r.contact_time as '%$fuzzyValue$%',, or r.contact_way as '%$fuzzyValue$%',, or r.clientele_attitude as '%$fuzzyValue$%',, or r.custom_manager as '%$fuzzyValue$%',, or r.survey_recode as '%$fuzzyValue$%',, or r.borrower_name as '%$fuzzyValue$%',, or r.group_number as '%$fuzzyValue$%',,

select count(*) from rl_return_visit r where r.borrower_id like '%$fuzzyValue$%', or r.contact_time as '%$fuzzyValue$%',, or r.contact_way as '%$fuzzyValue$%',, or r.clientele_attitude as '%$fuzzyValue$%',, or r.custom_manager as '%$fuzzyValue$%',, or r.survey_recode as '%$fuzzyValue$%',, or r.borrower_name as '%$fuzzyValue$%',, or r.group_number as '%$fuzzyValue$%',,
